author: Valerie Madding of 360 Farms
byline: “I couldn't be more pleased with the results!”

author: Lori Coats of My Raggedy Herbs
body: During my initial consultation, Braden was thorough and asked relevant questions in an attempt to learn about my company. If you are looking for logo work, web design, or any other brand development work, I would highly recommend him.

author: Amber Zurcher of Extier Inc.
byline: “Braden's services were exactly what we needed!”
